characters.name: Sunny
characters.description: The main protagonist. A frail orphan from the outskirts with dark circles under his eyes. Awakens with the Shadow Slave Aspect, granting him control over shadows. Known for his cunning mind, dark humor, and survival instinct. His flaw is that he cannot lie.

rank_progression.description: Marked by the Nightmare Spell, training at the Academy
Survived the First Nightmare on the Forgotten Shore
Achieved Master rank, now known as Master Sunless

characters.name: Nephis
characters.description: A beautiful silver-haired girl with burning eyes from Clan Valor. Daughter of the Broken Sword. Her Aspect allows her to ignite with inner fire. One of the most powerful Awakened of her generation. Forms a deep bond with Sunny.

rank_progression.description: Survived the Forgotten Shore alongside Sunny
Achieved Saint rank, one of the most powerful beings

characters.name: Cassie
characters.description: A blind girl with the gift of prophecy. Her visions of the future are terrifyingly accurate. Despite her gentle and kind nature, she carries a heavy burden. Later becomes associated with Clan Song.

rank_progression.description: Blind seer met on the Forgotten Shore
Reached Master rank with Clan Song

characters.name: Kai
characters.description: A handsome young man with a beautiful singing voice and charming personality. Comes from a wealthy background but harbors dark secrets about his past. His voice has special powers.

characters.name: Effie
characters.description: A fierce warrior with incredible physical strength and an even more incredible appetite. Despite her brash and lazy exterior, she is fiercely loyal and surprisingly perceptive. One of Sunny's closest friends.

characters.name: Caster
characters.description: A Legacy from Clan Song who initially seems arrogant and calculating. Proves to be a capable leader with his own complex motivations. Has complicated relationships with the cohort.

rank_progression.description: Met at the Academy as a Legacy

characters.name: Shadow
characters.description: Sunny's own shadow which gained sentience due to his Aspect. Mischievous and sometimes defiant, but ultimately loyal. Can act independently and has its own distinct personality.

characters.name: Stone Saint
characters.description: A powerful Echo that Sunny obtains. Once a great Saint in life, now serves as one of Sunny's most powerful combat assets. Silent but deadly, an ancient warrior of incredible power.

characters.name: Serpent
characters.description: A massive serpentine Nightmare Creature that Sunny bonds with. Serves as transportation and a powerful ally. Once ruled the waters of the Forgotten Shore.

characters.name: Nightmare
characters.description: A fearsome nightmare creature that becomes one of Sunny's shadows. A terrifying steed that can traverse impossible terrain.

characters.name: Gunlaug
characters.description: The tyrannical ruler of the Bright Castle on the Forgotten Shore. Once a hero, corrupted by power and desperation. Maintains order through fear and control.

characters.name: Harus
characters.description: Gunlaug's cunning advisor with a hunched back. Despite his unassuming appearance, he is dangerous and calculating. One of the main obstacles on the Forgotten Shore.

characters.name: Gemma
characters.description: A skilled hunter from the Bright Castle who becomes an ally to Sunny's cohort.

characters.name: Jet
characters.description: A powerful Master who becomes Sunny's mentor in the waking world. Cold and efficient in battle, but deeply cares for her students. Teaches Sunny essential combat skills.

characters.name: Teacher Julius
characters.description: An instructor at the Awakened Academy who teaches Sleepers about the Dream Realm and survival. Knowledgeable and somewhat eccentric.

characters.name: Mordret
characters.description: A terrifying and mysterious figure with the ability to possess bodies through reflections. One of the most dangerous beings Sunny encounters. Has connections to Clan Valor.

characters.name: Noctis
characters.description: An ancient Sovereign connected to shadow powers. Has deep connections to Sunny's Aspect and the nature of shadows themselves.

characters.name: Valor Matriarch
characters.description: The powerful leader of Clan Valor. Nephis's grandmother and a key political figure among the Great Clans.

characters.name: Weaver
characters.description: A primordial entity responsible for weaving the fundamental fabric of reality. Connected to fate and destiny. One of the most mysterious beings.

characters.name: Ananke
characters.description: A mysterious entity associated with fate and inevitability. One of the most enigmatic beings in the Dream Realm.

characters.name: Rain
characters.description: Sunny's younger sister whom he desperately tries to protect. Her potential awakening is a major plot point. Sunny's main motivation for surviving.

characters.name: Morgan
characters.description: A powerful figure from Clan Valor with connections to Nephis's past. Plays a significant role in clan politics.

characters.name: Anvil
characters.description: A skilled craftsman who can forge powerful Memories and equipment. An invaluable ally for enhancing gear.

characters.name: Belle
characters.description: A mysterious Awakened with charm-based abilities encountered in later arcs.

characters.name: Carapace Demon
characters.description: Nightmare Creatures with hard armored shells. Common but dangerous foes on the Forgotten Shore.

characters.name: Scavenger
characters.description: Pack creatures that feed on corpses. Common Nightmare Creatures that hunt in groups.

characters.name: Carapace Centurion
characters.description: A more powerful variant of the Carapace Demon. Commands lesser creatures.

characters.name: Spire Messenger
characters.description: Flying Nightmare Creatures that carry messages or hunt from the sky.

characters.name: Demon of Imagination
characters.description: A powerful daemon with the ability to create illusions and imaginary constructs. Creator of fantastical kingdoms. Also known as the Demon of Hope.

characters.name: Winter Beast
characters.description: Terrifying creatures adapted to frozen environments. Major threats during the Antarctic campaign.

characters.name: Clan Valor
characters.description: One of the Great Clans, known for producing powerful warriors. Nephis's clan. Values strength and honor above all.

characters.name: Clan Song
characters.description: One of the Great Clans, known for their prophecies and oracles. Cassie becomes associated with them. Masters of foresight.

characters.name: Clan Night
characters.description: One of the Great Clans, associated with darkness and shadow abilities. Mysterious and secretive.

characters.name: Great Clans
characters.description: The most powerful families that control much of human society. Include Valor, Song, Night, and others. Command enormous resources.

characters.name: Government
characters.description: The governing body of human civilization. Manages Awakened forces and defends against Nightmare Creatures.

characters.name: Puppeteer's Shroud
characters.description: Sunny's signature armor Memory obtained from his First Nightmare. A silk armor that can transform and protect.

characters.name: Shadow Lantern
characters.description: A powerful divine Memory that Sunny acquires. Can open gates to other realms.

characters.name: Sin of Solace
characters.description: A powerful weapon Memory with its own consciousness. One of Sunny's signature weapons.

terms.name: Nightmare Spell
terms.description: The mysterious force that descended upon Earth, bringing the Dream Realm and Nightmare Creatures. It grants humans the chance to become Awakened through surviving Nightmares. The fundamental change that altered humanity forever.

terms.name: Nightmare Creature
terms.description: Monstrous beings from the Dream Realm that threaten humanity. Ranked from Dormant to Unholy. Killing them yields soul shards and sometimes Memories.

terms.name: Awakened
terms.description: Humans who survived their First Nightmare and gained supernatural powers. The second rank of power after Sleeper. Can use Aspects and Memories.

terms.name: Dream Realm
terms.description: A parallel dimension where Nightmare Creatures originate. Connected to Earth through the Nightmare Spell. Contains countless dangers and treasures.

terms.name: First Nightmare
terms.description: The trial every Sleeper must survive to become Awakened. Takes place in the Dream Realm. Many die, but survivors gain powers.

terms.name: Aspect
terms.description: The unique supernatural ability granted to someone after becoming Awakened. Defines their powers and fighting style. Each Aspect is unique.

terms.name: Soul Core
terms.description: The source of an Awakened's power. Contains their essence and abilities. More cores mean more power.

terms.name: True Name
terms.description: The fundamental name of a being that holds power over their existence. Knowing one grants influence.

terms.name: Dormant
terms.description: The lowest class of Nightmare Creatures. Weak individually but dangerous in numbers. Also refers to the first rank of Memories.

terms.name: Memory
terms.description: Magical items created from the remnants of defeated Nightmare Creatures or powerful beings. Can be weapons, armor, or tools.

terms.name: Divine
terms.description: The highest quality of Memories and abilities. Incredibly rare and powerful. The seventh and highest rank.

terms.name: Flaw
terms.description: A weakness or curse that comes with every Aspect. Can be deadly or merely inconvenient. Sunny's flaw is that he cannot lie.

terms.name: Fallen
terms.description: Powerful Nightmare Creatures. Third rank of creature power. Challenging for most Awakened to face alone.

terms.name: Ascended
terms.description: The third rank of power for humans. Represents significant growth from baseline Awakened. Can begin to challenge Fallen creatures.

terms.name: Saint
terms.description: The fifth rank of power. Saints possess god-like abilities and are extremely rare. Can reshape reality in limited ways.

terms.name: Shadow Slave
terms.description: Sunny's unique Aspect. Allows him to control shadows, create shadow copies, and eventually command shadow servants.

terms.name: Master
terms.description: The fourth rank of power. Masters are elite Awakened with multiple soul cores. Can fight Corrupted creatures.

terms.name: Corrupted
terms.description: Fourth rank of Nightmare Creatures. Creatures that were once something else but have been twisted by darkness. Especially dangerous.

terms.name: Echo
terms.description: Creatures that can be bound to serve an Awakened, created from defeated Nightmare Creatures. Loyal companions in battle.

terms.name: Soul Sea
terms.description: The inner realm where an Awakened's soul cores and Memories are stored.

terms.name: Sleeper
terms.description: A human who has been marked by the Nightmare Spell but hasn't yet undergone their First Nightmare. Training at academies to prepare for their trial.

terms.name: Second Nightmare
terms.description: The trial to advance from Awakened to Ascended. More dangerous than the First, with lower survival rates.

terms.name: Third Nightmare
terms.description: The trial to advance from Ascended to Master. Survival rate is extremely low.

terms.name: Legacy
terms.description: Descendants of powerful Awakened who inherit enhanced potential and resources. Often members of Great Clans.

terms.name: Titan
terms.description: The most powerful class of Nightmare Creatures. Can destroy cities and challenge Saints.

terms.name: Shadow Fragment
terms.description: Resources Sunny collects by defeating enemies. Used to enhance his shadow abilities.

terms.name: Cohort
terms.description: A group of Awakened who survived together. Bonds forged in the Dream Realm are strong.

terms.name: Domain
terms.description: An area of absolute control that Saints can manifest. Within a Domain, the Saint is supreme.

terms.name: Fourth Nightmare
terms.description: The trial to advance from Master to Saint. Few ever attempt it, fewer survive.

terms.name: Weave
terms.description: The fundamental structure underlying reality and the Dream Realm. Can be perceived and manipulated by some.

terms.name: Blood Weave
terms.description: A technique involving the manipulation of blood and life force. Dangerous but powerful.

terms.name: Lineage
terms.description: Inherited traits and powers from ancestors. Important for Legacy families.

terms.name: Daemon
terms.description: Powerful beings, neither fully Nightmare Creature nor human. Often ancient and mysterious.

terms.name: Great Clans
terms.description: The most powerful families in human society. Control vast resources and political power.

terms.name: Sovereign
terms.description: The highest known rank. Sovereigns are god-like beings with reality-warping powers. Only a handful exist.

terms.name: Ascension
terms.description: The process of advancing to a higher rank. Requires surviving specific trials.

terms.name: Seed of Nightmare
terms.description: Locations where the Dream Realm bleeds into the real world, spawning Nightmare Creatures. Must be destroyed or contained.

terms.name: Nightmare Gate
terms.description: Portals between the real world and Dream Realm. Can appear randomly or be created.

terms.name: Shadow Dance
terms.description: Sunny's signature combat technique. Allows him to merge with and move through shadows.

terms.name: Shadow Manifestation
terms.description: Advanced shadow technique allowing creation of solid shadow constructs.

terms.name: Shadow Bond
terms.description: The connection between Sunny and his shadow servants. Allows communication and power sharing.

locations.name: Dream Realm
locations.description: A parallel dimension where Nightmare Creatures originate. Connected to Earth through the Nightmare Spell. Contains countless dangers, treasures, and mysteries.

locations.name: Outskirts
locations.description: The poor, lawless districts on the edges of cities. Sunny's birthplace and childhood home. Dangerous and impoverished.

locations.name: Spell Academy
locations.description: Schools in the real world that train Sleepers before they undergo their First Nightmare. Where Sunny met many of his companions.

locations.name: Forgotten Shore
locations.description: A dangerous coastal region in the Dream Realm where many Sleepers are sent for their First Nightmare. Features ruins of an ancient civilization, deadly creatures, and the Bright Castle.

locations.name: Bright Castle
locations.description: A fortified castle in the Forgotten Shore that serves as a refuge for survivors. Ruled tyrannically by Gunlaug until its fall.

locations.name: Dark City
locations.description: A massive ruined metropolis in the Forgotten Shore, filled with powerful Nightmare Creatures and ancient secrets. Built by a lost civilization.

locations.name: Labyrinth
locations.description: A massive maze-like structure in the Dream Realm. Contains valuable treasures but is extremely dangerous to navigate.

locations.name: Waking World
locations.description: The real world, as opposed to the Dream Realm. Where humanity struggles to survive against Gates and Nightmare Creatures.

locations.name: Ivory Tower
locations.description: A significant structure in the Dream Realm associated with knowledge and power. Part of the Chained Isles.

locations.name: Chained Isles
locations.description: A region of floating islands held together by ancient chains. Connected to the Demon of Hope.

locations.name: Kingdom of Hope
locations.description: A realm created by the Demon of Imagination/Hope. Beautiful but ultimately tragic.

locations.name: Red Colosseum
locations.description: An arena in the Dream Realm where battles are fought for various purposes.

locations.name: Shadow Realm
locations.description: A domain of pure darkness within the Dream Realm. Connected to shadow powers and Sunny's abilities.

locations.name: Antarctic
locations.description: The frozen continent, site of crucial battles against Nightmare Creatures. Location of the Falcon Scott siege.

locations.name: Falcon Scott
locations.description: A research station in Antarctica that became the site of a massive siege against Nightmare Creatures. Where Sunny earned the title 'Devil of Antarctica'.

locations.name: Twilight Sea
locations.description: A vast ocean separating major Dream Realm continents. Contains its own horrors and wonders.

locations.name: Tomb of Ariel
locations.description: An ancient structure where time flows differently. Home to the Riverborn and Outsiders.

locations.name: Citadel
locations.description: Major fortified human settlements designed to withstand Nightmare Creature attacks.

locations.name: Bastion
locations.description: Defensive positions in the Dream Realm or waking world. Smaller than Citadels.

locations.name: Sanctuary
locations.description: Safe havens in the Dream Realm, rare and precious.

locations.name: Abyss
locations.description: The deepest, most dangerous region of the Dream Realm. Few who enter ever return.

events.name: Nightmare Spell Descends
events.description: The cataclysmic event that changed humanity forever, bringing the Dream Realm and Nightmare Creatures to Earth.

events.name: Sunny's First Nightmare Begins
events.description: Sunny enters the Dream Realm for his First Nightmare, the beginning of his journey.

events.name: Sunny Becomes Awakened
events.description: After surviving the horrors of the Forgotten Shore, Sunny becomes an Awakened with the Shadow Slave Aspect.

events.name: Fall of the Bright Castle
events.description: The destruction of the main safe haven on the Forgotten Shore, forcing survivors to flee into the wilderness.

events.name: Escape from the Forgotten Shore
events.description: The cohort's desperate journey across the Dream Realm to return to the waking world.

events.name: Discovery of Stone Saint
events.description: Sunny discovers and binds the Stone Saint Echo, one of his most powerful allies.

events.name: Binding the Soul Serpent
events.description: Sunny defeats and binds the Soul Serpent, gaining a powerful ally and transportation.

events.name: Meeting Mordret
events.description: First encounter with the Prince of Nothing, one of the most dangerous beings in the Dream Realm.

events.name: Seed of Nightmare Discovery
events.description: Discovery of the Seed of Nightmare and the truth about the Chained Isles.

events.name: Second Nightmare Trial
events.description: Sunny's horrific trial to advance from Awakened to Ascended, experiencing countless deaths.

events.name: Sunny Becomes Ascended
events.description: Sunny completes his Second Nightmare and advances to the Ascended rank.

events.name: Master Sunless
events.description: Sunny achieves Master rank and begins teaching at the Awakened Academy.

events.name: Antarctic Campaign Begins
events.description: A major military operation against Nightmare Creatures in Antarctica begins.

events.name: Siege of Falcon Scott
events.description: Desperate battle at the Antarctic research station. Sunny earns the title 'Devil of Antarctica'.

events.name: Rain's Awakening
events.description: Sunny's sister Rain undergoes her transformation, changing the stakes dramatically.

events.name: Discovery of the Tomb
events.description: Entering the Tomb of Ariel and learning about the Riverborn and time manipulation.

events.name: Confrontation with Noctis
events.description: Encounter with the Shadow Sovereign, revealing connections to Sunny's Aspect.

events.name: Nephis Becomes Saint
events.description: Nephis achieves the legendary Saint rank, becoming one of the most powerful beings.
